statements.statement: INSERT INTO revision (rev_page, rev_text_id, rev_comment, rev_minor_edit, rev_user, rev_user_text, rev_timestamp, rev_deleted, rev_len, rev_parent_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) RETURNING rev_id
INSERT INTO text (old_page,old_text,old_flags) VALUES (?,?,?) RETURNING old_id
